/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The viewer's perspective is that of a pedestrian standing on the sidewalk, immersed in the city's daily life. The street, lined with trees and buildings, is filled with cars and trucks, indicating a busy time of day. The sky overhead is overcast, casting a soft light over the scene. The image is taken from a low angle, adding a sense of depth and perspective to the view.
